channel.title: Idk if this is server side or client sided but in need help
channel.description: umm im making a glaive based on the one from dark sector and the picture im using has black flames on it and it looks really cool and i was wondering if theird be a way to make the weapon on fire and if posibble change the color of the flames to black i would really appreciate help and if i get it to work right i will release if its good
